properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 2 at 8:37AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Oliver
Lock and Dam...

.Heavy rainfall of two to four inches is forecast across much of
the Black Warrior River basin during the next 48 hours...and a flood
warning remains in effect for the lower Black Warrior River.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* from Friday afternoon until further notice...or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At 8:15 AM Thursday the stage was 84.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Friday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 98.6 feet by early Tuesday morning.
Additional rises are possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 98 feet...Some cabins and trailers along the river
begin to flood. Widespread flooding of wood lands and pasture lands
in the area can be expected.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
